quest.name: A Touch of Home
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol wants to give the Stopple a touch of home.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid slate in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid slate to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid water ivy in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid water ivy to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid eryops at Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid eryops to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ours is a large undertaking, and we expect to be hunkered down here for a good long while. That being the case, I've a mind to add some creature comforts to the Stopple.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: MistressMaster Forename, I'd be in your debt if you could procure a few things to help me make this place a home away from home.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Specifically, I require three slabs of slate. These can be had in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Many thanks, madamsir, and happy digging!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Specifically, I require three lengths of water ivy. These can be had in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Many thanks, madamsir, and happy gathering!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Specifically, I require an eryops. They dwell in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta, and are passing fond of fruit worms. Many thanks, madamsir, and happy fishing!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: While there's no avoiding getting a little wet, the slate ought not pose you too much trouble. I await your return with bated breath!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: While there's no avoiding getting a little wet, the water ivy ought not pose you too much trouble. I await your return with bated breath!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: So long as you use fruit worms as bait, the eryops ought not pose you too much trouble. I await your return with bated breath!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, madamsir. May I ask if you have that which I requested?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Yes, this is absolutely splendid! My gratitude!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: By making the Stopple more comfortable, our workers will be better rested. And a rested worker is a productive worker! Oh yes, perhaps we can look into extending the length of shifts...
